metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39657 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In ufshcd_eh_device_reset_handler of ufshcd.c, there is a possible out ofbounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to localinformation disclosure with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-194696049References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39657` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
